sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
.debug-panel
  h4 Currently Playing:
  h4 name: {{ songName }}
  h4 videoId: {{ videoID}}
  .songs(v-for="(song, id) in currentPlaylist")
    .song
      v-divider(v-if="id !== 0")
      .name(:class="{current: currentSong.videoId === song.videoId}") name: {{ song.name }}
      .videoId(:class="{current: currentSong.videoId === song.videoId}") name: {{ song.videoId }}
</template>
<script>
import { mapState } from 'pinia'
import { usePlaylistStore } from '../store/playlist'
import SongList from './SongList.vue'
import { VDivider } from 'vuetify/components'
export default {
  components: {
    SongList,
    VDivider
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapState(usePlaylistStore, ['currentSong', 'currentPlaylist']),

    songName(){
      return this.currentSong.name || 'N/A'
    },
    videoID() {
      return this.currentSong.videoId || 'N/A'
    },
  }
}
</script>
<style lang="scss" scoped>
@import 'src/styles/flex';

.debug-panel {
  z-index: 1000;
  width: 300px;
  height: 500px;
  position: absolute;
  top: 100px;
  right: 35px;
  border: 1px red dotted;
  background-color: pink;
  overflow-y: scroll;

  .songs {
    @include flex-row();
    font-size: 1rem;

    .song {
      .videoId {
        &.current {
          color: red;
        }
      }

      .name {
        &.current {
          color: red;
        }
      }
    }
  }
}</style>
